sources.title: Cops Is Always Right (1938)
sources.description: Popeye is heading over to see Olive when he hits a traffic island where a cop is directing traffic; when he gets there, he manages to get more tickets for blowing his horn and parking illegally. The cop rings the bell, and Popeye manages to wreck Olive's apartment by dropping what he's doing, each time he writes a ticket. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/cops-is-always-right-1938/

The cop rings the bell, and Popeye manages to wreck Olive's apartment by dropping what he's doing, each time he writes a ticket.
metadata.Actors: Margie Hines, Frank Matalone, Jack Mercer
